## Problem / Use Case
Describe the problem you're trying to solve or the use case.

## Proposed Solution
What feature would help? How should it work?

## Alternatives Considered
Any other approaches you've considered.

## Transit Agency Context
If you're a transit agency, share any relevant context:
- Agency size (vehicles, riders/day)
- Current workaround (if any)
- Priority (nice-to-have vs critical)

## Additional Context
Screenshots, mockups, links to similar implementations, etc.
